TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A type of acupuncture in which a microwave device is attached to an acupuncture needle to give microwave radiation at an acupuncture point.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "acupuntura con microondas"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo de acupuntura en la que se conecta un dispositivo de microondas a una aguja, para administrar radiaci√≥n de microondas en un punto de acupuntura.
